text: It is possible to use an external Version Control System for storing Configuration artifacts. MediationZone provides a way to export and import configurations from MediationZone into a working copy of the Version Control System. Configurations are stored in an XML format. Changes to the configurations can be diffed/merged using the tools provided by the Version Control System.
title: External Version Control System - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
